dtliExcerpt: Rebecca Hall gives a shattering performance as a young woman trapped in the suffocating conventions of society, marriage and motherhood in Sophie Treadwell's 1928 expressionistic drama.
bwwExcerpt: Enthralled as we are to our digital gadgetry, you'd think we'd identify with the heroine of "Machinal," Sophie Treadwell's 1928 Expressionistic melodrama (inspired by the infamous Ruth Snyder case) about a woman driven to murder trying to escape her fate in a mechanized society....
showScoreExcerpt: Rebecca Hall gives a shattering performance as a young woman trapped in the suffocating conventions of society, marriage and motherhood in Sophie Treadwell's 1928 expressionistic drama.
